text: Lionel Richie/Commodores Gold is a two disc compilation album by American R&B; singer Lionel Richie and American Funk and soul band Commodores, released on January 10, 2006.Australian Charts - Lionel Richie/Commodores - Gold It contains songs from both his successful solo career and as part of the band the Commodores.NZ Charts - Lionel Richie/Commodores - Gold == Track listing == ===Disc one=== ===Disc two=== == Charts == {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- !scope="col"| Chart (2007) !scope="col"| Peak position |- !scope="row"| UK (Official Charts Company) | style="text- align:center;"| 147 |} == References == Lionel Richie Category:Lionel Richie albums Category:Commodores albums Category:2006 compilation albums Category:Hip-O Records compilation albums Category:Universal Music Group compilation albums Category:Motown compilation albums Category:Split albums Category:Collaborative albums Category:Albums produced by David Foster Category:Albums produced by James Anthony Carmichael Category:Albums produced by Lionel Richie Category:Albums produced by Jimmy Jam and Terry Lewis
title: Gold (Lionel Richie album)
